reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's cable pattern and find it comfortable, not itchy, and of good quality. The fit is positive, with one customer noting it covers the rear with plenty of space to spare, and they appreciate its warmth, particularly for brunch on cold days. The size and length receive mixed feedback - while some find it perfect oversized, others say it runs big, and while some like the length, others find it too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars White vs beige
items.body: Ok yâ€™all, Iâ€™m crazy and bought two different colors and three different sizes. So if youâ€™re debating, this is the review for you!! This sweater dress is beautiful. Very soft and super comfortable!! Itâ€™s definitely oversized. Size down if you want a more fitted look but if youâ€™re looking for the oversized cute and comfy look, go with your original size. Iâ€™m 5â€™2, about 195lbs and this XL dress fit beautifully for an oversized look. The sleeves were so long they went over my fingertips but I can pull them up to look nice and the length is right above my knees. Itâ€™s very comfy and could be comfortable as a Christmas movie watching, couch day or dressed up for a party or pictures. I would buy again! For color reference the one packaged on the right is the beige color and the one on the left is the white color of this same sweater dress. The white does have a tad light yellow shade which is super disappointing, as I got this to match my daughterâ€™s first Christmas sweater. Read more
items.author: Kirby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Comfy Sweater !
items.body: This sweater is beautiful! Quality is nice ! I ordered an XS - I am 5â€™6â€ 115 lbs. itâ€™s oversized and great with leggings. Material thickness is thick and soft. Not see through and is warm. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater but not quite like the photo
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This is a beautiful sweater made out of soft looking yarn. It is really pretty, but in my opinion, it does not look like the thick, sturdy, chunky, Irish knit sweater in the image. If youâ€™re looking for a lighter, nicely machine knit sweater, this one is perfect. I did not open the package so I canâ€™t comment on what it feels or fits like. I could tell through the clear packaging it had a slight shine and looks soft. It was nice but not what I personally looking for. Hope this helps someone. Read more
items.author: Wright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You deserve this dress!
items.body: This dress is fabulous!! If youâ€™re on the fence about ordering this one- add to cart now! Itâ€™s super comfy, doesnâ€™t look cheap, material is not hot! Sizing is perfect- 5â€™8â€ 130# and ordered the small. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweater
items.body: Amazing comfort and warmth. I love the color and it so far seems pretty well made especially for the price. Its a great deal and I would probably buy another. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super SHORT!
items.body: This dress is very VERY short. If you want any type of coverage on your legs, do not buy this. When you raise your hands, the dress rides very hide that your bottom is going to be out. The style is cute, just too short. There was no smell. The dress was comfortable. The dress has stretch. Read more
items.author: MC SLP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big, good quality
items.body: Runs big, order a smaller size than your usual size. Looks great and good quality Read more
items.author: Jenice James

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars apricot not recommended
items.body: iâ€™m roughly 200 lbs and 5â€6. length wise this is great! however, the color and the fact that it is see-through is a no go. i got the color apricot and it does not look like how it does on the model. in person it has a yellow tint and has a weird smell which iâ€™ve seen a few other reviews say the same thing. it is also see through, so being on the bigger size more than likely youâ€™ll need to wear a tank top and possibly even some shorts. i got it today, tried it on, seen the color and the fact it was see through and after thanksgiving will be returning it. i WOULD NOT recommend the apricot color. i got it in beige which shows in the 2nd picture. the size was just too small. if i had it in my right size i wouldâ€™ve kept the beige. Read more
items.author: Carol Lyons

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Cherry, Deep Green, Blue, Red Pink, Rust Orange, Apricot, Opal, Deep Gray, Black, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
